Question: Fifth Ingenium S.r.l.s CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
FifthIngenium S.r.l.s

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- FifthIngenium will be showcasing its cutting-edge eXtended Reality (XR) platform at CES 2024.
- The XRV platform revolutionizes the creation and experience of XR content, offering content-agnostic integration into corporate ecosystems in verticals such as Training and Education, Manufacturing, Healthcare, and Tourism.
- The company will be unveiling its revolutionary TINALP, the first end-to-end XR solution for education and training, featuring Augmented Classrooms for real-time interaction between teachers and students.
- The products include advanced learning with Mixed Reality & Augmented Intelligence, smart objects and e-learning for school inclusion, and XR solutions for digital dentistry and face scanning.
- FifthIngenium is a high-tech company specializing in software solutions for industry 4.0, education, healthcare, tourism, and advertising, leveraging AR/VR, Cloud Computing, and AI technologies.

For more information, visit fifthingenium.com.
